title: [Solhaven, Nerite Lane]
description: Amid the intermixed dwellings and storefronts, a well-maintained shop catches your eye.  From the trimly-painted frame of the generous doorway to the fresh whitewash of the half-timbered walls, the very appearance of the shop says - Quality -.

Amid the intermixed dwellings and storefronts, a well-maintained shop catches your eye.  From the trimly-painted frame of the generous doorway to the fresh whitewash of the half-timbered walls, the immaculate appearance of the shop alludes to the quality of its wares.
